name: questionGenerator
description: function to generate a question given a question standard and a topic of interest of the user.
parameters: {'type': 'object', 'properties': {'intro': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'a quick introduction and context of the topic of the question being asked.'}, 'question': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'the actual question the user must answer.'}, 'possibleAnswers': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'a list of the possible answers the user must choose from separated by a comma and encapsulated in [].'}, 'answer': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'the index of the right answer in the possible answers list'}, 'explanation': {'type': 'string', 'description': 'an explanation of why the right answer should be the right answer. It should be clear and comprehensive.'}}}
